articles.title: Philippines' Duterte speeds through $80 billion 2020 budget, spending up 12%

articles.title: Aldi UK's Christmas sales growth fuelled by alcohol and premium ranges
articles.description: Aldi UK, the British arm of the German discount supermarket, said on Monday total sales rose 7.9% year-on-year in the four weeks to Dec. 24, driven by strong demand for beers, wines and spirits and its range of premium products.
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - Aldi UK, the British arm of the German discount supermarket, said on Monday total sales rose 7.9% year-on-year in the four weeks to Dec. 24, driven by strong demand for beers, wines and spirits and its range of premium products.

articles.title: Equinor seeks 40% greenhouse gas reduction in Norway by 2030
articles.description: Norwegian oil producer Equinor aims to cut greenhouse gas emissions generated at offshore fields and onshore plants in Norway by about 40% in the coming decade and to near zero by 2050, it said on Monday.
articles.content:
OSLO (Reuters) - Norwegian oil producer Equinor aims to cut greenhouse gas emissions generated at offshore fields and onshore plants in Norway by about 40% in the coming decade and to near zero by 2050, it said on Monday.

articles.content:
